===COMMANDS LIST===


List of the commands for the sylverant pso server.

/warp [area] Warps the user to the selected area, values from 1 to 15. 
/Kill [guildcard] Bans the selected guildcard. 
/minlvl [level] Sets a minimum level for the game 
/maxlvl [level] Sets a maximum level for the game 
/refresh [quests/gms] Refreshes the quests or gms list 
/save [slot] Saves the character data on the server, slots 1-4. 
/restore [slot] restores the character data on the server, slots 1-4.
